column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=King Bumi says : " Aang , stop your blowing for a minute . "
#Text=King Bumi says : " Now hold on just a duahhh !!! "
#Text=Aang says : " It 's just like old times , is n't it , Bumi ? "
#Text=King Bumi says : " Aang , I need to talk to you ! "
#Text=Aang says : " It 's good to see you too ! "
#Text=Mai says : " How are you gon na fight without your bending ? "
#Text=Sokka says : " I seem to manage ! "
#Text=Katara says : " There 's Aang ! "
#Text=Sokka says : " We can catch him ! "
#Text=Aang says : " Hang on , Bumi !
#Text=All along ?
#Text=" King Bumi says : " Well , they did n't cover my face .
#Text=" Aang says : " I do n't understand .
#Text=Why did n't you free yourself ?
#Text=Why did you surrender when Omashu was invaded ?
#Text=What 's the matter with you , Bumi ?
#Text=" King Bumi says : " Listen to me , Aang .
#Text=There are options in fighting , called jing .
#Text=It 's a choice of how you direct your energy .
#Text=" Aang says : " I know !
#Text=There 's positive jing when you 're attacking , and negative jing when you 're retreating .
#Text=" King Bumi says : " ... and neutral jing when you do nothing !
#Text=" Aang says : " There are three jings ?
#Text=" King Bumi says : " Well , technically there are eighty - five , but let 's just focus on the third .
#Text=Neutral jing is the key to earthbending .
#Text=It involves listening and waiting for the right moment to strike .
#Text=" Aang says : " That 's why you surrendered , is n't it ?
#Text=" King Bumi says : " Yes , and it 's why I ca n't leave now .
#Text=" Aang says : " I guess I need to find someone else to teach me earthbending .
#Text=" King Bumi says : " Your teacher will be someone who has mastered neutral jing .
#Text=You need to find someone who waits and listens before striking .
#Text=" Aang says : " Hey , Momo !
#Text=" King Bumi says : " Momo 's mastered a few jings himself !
#Text=" King Bumi says : " Goodbye , Aang .
#Text=I 'll see you when the time is right .
#Text=" Mai says : " So , we 're tracking down your brother and Uncle , huh ?
#Text=" Ty Lee says : " It 'll be interesting seeing Zuko again , wo n't it , Mai ?
#Text=" Azula says : " It 's not just Zuko and Iroh anymore .
#Text=We have a third target now .
#Text="
